thread.title_full: Donald Trump Thinks Barack Obama Is Conspiring Against Him! Quote Of The Day! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Donald Trump Thinks Barack Obama Is Conspiring Against Him! Day!
text:
"I think that President Obama is behind it because his people certainly are behind it. And in some of the leaks possibly comes from that group… In terms of him being behind things, that's politics. It will probably continue."
– Donald Trump , on his suspicions that Barack Obama is behind the nationwide protests against his presidency, AND the unflattering stories coming out about his administration.
[ Image via CNN / Fox News . ]
Tags: barack obama , conspiracy corner , donald trump , politik , Quote: of the day
